PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-10081998-06-110,  ,  HRDC,  , 
PrecisAuthority to enter into (a) an AGREEMENT with the Province of QUEBEC which provides for making a financial contribution towards a comprehensive program for the VOCATIONAL REHABILITATION OF DISABLED PERSONS in the 1996-97 and 1997-98 fiscal years, and (b) a SUPPLEMENTARY AGREEMENT with the other provinces and territories in order to increase contributions for those same years.
Attachments
